articles.content: It has taken them a while, but the Indian cricket team has finally reached a stage where it is no longer a one-man army or a two-man show. Gone are the days when the team crumbled like a pack of card… [+3728 chars]

articles.title: 'He is a good batter but...': Harbhajan's huge remark on Rohit before 2nd Test - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Impressed with Rohit Sharma's leadership style, Harbhajan Singh has issued a huge statement about the Indian skipper amid the Border-Gavaskar Trophy 2023 between India and Australia. | Cricket
